items.name: Phone
items.description:
There's a message from Jeremy: 
'I have a favor to ask! One of my workers fell sick. 
Can you pick up some last-minute groceries for me? I need...' 
You can't make sense of the rest of the message. 
It's probably best to speak to Jeremy in person.

items.name: Keys
items.description: These are the keys to my house.

items.name: Wallet
items.description: Just a few dollars, my ID, and cards.

items.name: What in Carnations? A guide to flowers book
items.description:
Flower Type  | Symbol | Scent  | Size   | Colour
- Roses      | R      | Strong | Medium | Red
- Gardenias  | G      | Strong | Large  | White
- Daisies    | D      | Light  | Medium | White
- Lavenders  | L      | Strong | Small  | Purple
- Sunflowers | S      | Light  | Large  | Yellow
- Tulips     | T      | Light  | Medium | Red
- Hydrangeas | H      | Light  | Large  | Blue

items.description: This recipe ought to be a trade secret!

items.description: The ink is leaking. What a mess!

items.description: A cup of tea served by Mrs. Smith for some afternoon tea.

items.description: A box of various old items to go for donation.

items.name: Max
items.description: Poor guy, he must be so scared. I should return him to Mrs. Davis.

items.name: Lavender
items.description: Smells amazing.

items.name: Out of This World! A guide to space book
items.description: Nothing like a book on space to trigger my existentialism.

items.description: A book on computer science. I don't get it at all!
